title: The Tryst List
description: What happens in Vegas doesn't always stay in Vegas. After a whirlwind one-night stand, Jordan thought she'd found her soulmate in Peter—until he disappeared at dawn. Years later, with Peter out of sight but not out of mind, Jordan crafts a daring tryst list to shake up her love life. But just as she’s ready to move on, Peter reappears, determined to win her back and willing to help her tick off every adventurous item on her list. As sparks reignite, secrets surface, threatening their second chance at love.Experience the heat and heartbreak of Jordan and Peter's rollercoaster romance in The Tryst List. With a plot that keeps you guessing, characters that leap off the page, and a love story that burns hot, this book is a must-read.
author: Kaylene Winter
